newsitem.title: ESTONIA: SOOTS TURISM SHARE ISSUE TO CONTINUE.
newsitem.headline: SOOTS TURISM SHARE ISSUE TO CONTINUE.

text.p: Hoiupank Investments said on Tuesday it has signed a deal to register Soots Turism shares in the central depository which means there are no obstacles to starting the company's share issue.

The securities inspectorate on Monday stopped the public offer of catering company Soots because the company had not registered its shares in the central depository although it said it had in its prospectus.
The subscription of Soots shares will start after Hoiupank Investments gets a licence for the issue from the inspectorate.
Soots announced a public offer of 5.4 million kroons, which will raise the company's share capital to 14 million kroons.
